snippet: The Kansas City Chiefs put tight end Kevin Boss on injured reserve with a head injury after doctors determined they would not clear him to play the rest of the year.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Kansas City Chiefs put tight end Kevin Boss on injured reserve after he sustains head injury in Week 2; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Kansas City Chiefs put tight end Kevin Boss on injured reserve with a head injury after doctors determined they would not clear him to play the rest of the year.

headline.seo: Kevin Boss of Kansas City Chiefs Done for the Season
headline.main: Chiefs Tight End Is Out for Season With Head Injury
headline.print_headline: Chiefs Tight End Is Out for Season With Head Injury
